page.title: 18Likes and Dislikes.
page.content: The next question we put to the populace was:{What do you like about {the area?}The answers to this were varied but generally they fell into the same categories.These were : Quiet and peaceful surroundings,Village and Community Life having a nice friendly atmosphere. Unfortunately,people in answer to the question:{Are there things in the area {that you do not like?}These out weighed the good things.They were,No Gas supply in the village,the speed of traffic through the village,shortage of a bus-service,lack of concern by dog owners to control their dog's toilet habits on the pavements. Several of the households said they disliked the 'gypsies' on the Heath, and that the Sand Quarry brought in far too many unwanted visitors.
